column2: District Judge has come to a correct decision that the Plaintiff has failed to prove

column1: that the Defendant has encroached on Lot S.

column3: I am  therefore of the view that the findings  of the  learned  District Judge

column2: must stand and should not be disturbed.

column3: I dismiss the appeal with costs.

column6: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
